name: DOCS_RCVD_ADT_EVT_HISTORY
description: This table contains event history information from external ADT encounters.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EVT_HX_REF_IDENT
columns.description: Unique identifier for the ADT event history data.

columns.name: EVT_HX_ENC_IDENT
columns.description: Reference ID of the associated encounter.

columns.name: EVT_HX_EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The event type category ID for the ADT event.

columns.name: EVT_HX_EVENT_PAT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient class category ID for the ADT event.

columns.name: EVT_HX_FAC_NAME
columns.description: Facility name of the ADT event.

columns.name: EVT_HX_DEPT_NAME
columns.description: Department name of the ADT event.

columns.name: EVT_HX_EVT_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Start instant for the ADT event in UTC.

columns.name: EVT_HX_SPECIALTY_DEP_C_NAME
columns.description: The specialty category ID for the ADT event.
